name: all colors pack
summary: all colors pack 1.0 There are 223 of them included
description: This package is simply to help people who want to look at alot of color schemes.  It is all the color schemes on vim.sf.net as of March 13th, 2006 -- zipped up in a single package.  There are 223 of them included.  Every single theme was updated to its newest revision.
install_details:
Simply unzip, and place the files in ~/.vim/plugin and ~/.vim/colors --- it will unzip with correct dir structure, so you can just unzip to ~/.vim 
<F12> is change next color.
